content:
I've noticed a couple of pending PR from dependabot to update the triagebot dependencies. Any reason to keep them waiting or can they be merged (no rush, ofc)?
https://github.com/rust-lang/triagebot/pulls
(btw, it the answer is "we had a release to deliver" - I totally understand :smile: )

Also - tangentially related, can anyone also pls merge this tiny patch to enable the triagebot label commands on the rust#compiler-team repo?
https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/pull/429
